qas.question: When was the first Port of Plymouth Regatta?
In what month and year did Plymouth play host to the America's Cup World Series?
For how many days did the America's Cup World Series take place in Plymouth?

context: Plymouth is an important centre for watersports, especially scuba diving and sailing. The Port of Plymouth Regatta is one of the oldest regattas in the world, and has been held regularly since <a0_0>1823<a0_0/>. In <a1_0>September 2011<a1_0/>, Plymouth hosted the America's Cup World Series for <a2_0>nine<a2_0/> days.
